label: cascading_failure_01_dx_auth_audit_028
content:

### Events
- Reviewed remaining attestation reminders; 3 managers still unresponsive; prepared escalation to department heads.
- Validated that ticket-ID enforcement is blocking privileged requests without references; 5 requests rejected automatically.
- Analyzed token rotation failures; top cause remains client-side time drift; added monitoring query to weekly report.
- Performed directory sync spot audit: verified 16 deletions removed from all RBAC groups within 15 minutes.

### On Call
- On Call Shift: C. Adeyemi

- On Call Status: Stable; enforcement working and escalations queued.
